reviewText: Soft core at its worst not worth the money
This was a gay porn show without the porn. This was not a gay movie. With the key word being "movie". Thank you Amazon for my money back so I could buy a real "gay movie".
A hardcore movie with all fellatio scenes removed. Worth only to see the feature's main star naked!

Erotic Force is a disgusting rip-off. It is neither a film nor even soft core. It appears to be a porn film with the porn removed. At 50 minutes of grunting heads I presume the very ordinary cast were having a good time. It is the director /producers and distributors who should be chastised for having the gall to release such a piece of nothing. Future customers please be warned to avoid wasting money as I did. I tend to buy every gay film released and fully expect some to be below par, but hopefully made by people with enthusiasm even if they lack talent, but this is not such a case as it is just a cynical rip off. In future I will be careful about pre ordering things advertised as a film that are merely a rather poor hardcore film stripped of all the flesh and leaving 50 minutes of dishonest wasted time. I will also know to avoid Greenwood Cooper Home Video and expect an apology to customers taken in by such misleading promotion. Having gathered over 1460 gay films I do know the difference between low budget and misleading dishonest product.

just an  excuse by a dvd company to squeeze out a few more dollars but cutting out all the sex scenes of a porn flic and re marketing as a movie with somewhat of a story...DON'T buy this piece of crap..

really has no plot.  it has a few lines between the actors and then right to the sex.
it is a soft porn, they don't show really anything, but you are aware that they are doing it.
